jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
ABOUT US üöÄ

Hostelworld Group, the global hostel-focussed online booking platform, inspires adventurous minds to meet the world and come back with life-changing stories to tell. Our customers are not your average tourists, they crave cultural connection and unique experiences that we make possible by providing an unbeatable selection of hostels in unmissable locations ‚Äì all in the palm of their hand.

It is the social nature and community feel of hostels and their environment, that enable travellers to embrace journeys of discovery, adventure and meaning. We have more than 13 million reviews across 17,800 hostels in more than 179 countries, making the brand the leading online hub for social travel. The website operates in 19 different languages and our mobile app in 13 languages.

Founded in 1999 and headquartered in Dublin, Hostelworld has a growing, high-calibre team of 230 people within Technology, Product, Global Markets, HR, Finance & Legal and Marketing Teams across our Dublin, London, Porto, Shanghai and Sydney offices. Hostelworld is listed on the London Stock Exchange and Dublin Euronext. You can read more about our story here.

LOCATIONüåç

This role is based in Portugal. We have an office hub in Porto available for those who prefer a hybrid model where you can spend time with colleagues in-person. You will need to be able to commute to our office hub as required from time to time.

WHO YOU'LL WORK WITH üë®üèΩ‚Äçü§ù‚Äçüë®üèº

The iOS Software Engineer is an integral part of a dedicated squad consisting of software engineers, QA (Quality Assurance) engineers, and UI/UX designers. This squad‚Äôs mission is to work on Hostelworld‚Äôs innovative native iOS application, working to deliver killer social features, experiments, and functionality directly to our customer base.

We are looking to hire for several iOS Developer roles from junior to senior level.
WHAT YOU'LL DO üë©‚Äçüíª
‚Ä¢ The role requires both killer tech skills and an in-depth knowledge of apple technology, frameworks, and feature set
‚Ä¢ Develop application features within the Swift and SwiftUI framework (there might be the very odd bit of Objective-C thrown in, but we keep that to a minimum üòÄ)
‚Ä¢ Guarantee quality of new features, using unit and UI tests to validate the implementations, working alongside our talented QA team to ensure the best possible experience for our customers
‚Ä¢ Work alongside your team and the wider company to create and support a rewarding working environment that aligns with the company culture
‚Ä¢ Help establish a culture of continuous learning in the team and effective agile team and technical practices
‚Ä¢ Work with product owners/managers to plan and scope projects and features, from conception all the way through to delivery

WHAT WE‚ÄôRE LOOKING FOR üëÄ

Experience & Qualifications:
‚Ä¢ Degree in computer science or similar
‚Ä¢ 3+ years of native iOS development
‚Ä¢ Experience in building and publishing commercial iOS applications
‚Ä¢ In-Depth understanding of Swift and iOS
‚Ä¢ Experience on Objective C is a plus

Knowledge & Skills:
‚Ä¢ Proficiency with Swift language and best practices
‚Ä¢ Experience with Apple's approaches to concurrency (Combine & Async Await)
‚Ä¢ Writing testable code, and knowledge of unit and UI testing using Apple‚Äôs XCTest / XCUITest frameworks
‚Ä¢ Consuming web APIs using JSON and Apple‚Äôs Codable protocol
‚Ä¢ Experience in CI/CD workflows, including knowledge of source control management via Git or another distributed version control mechanism
‚Ä¢ Experience working with remote teams
‚Ä¢ Excellent analytical / problem- solving ability
‚Ä¢ Understanding of software development in terms of business value
‚Ä¢ Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, including designers, product managers, and QA engineers.
‚Ä¢ A self-starter who is solutions-focused
‚Ä¢ Ability to prioritise and meet deadlines
‚Ä¢ Proficient in both spoken and written English

WHAT WE OFFER üíØ
‚Ä¢ Competitive salary & benefits
‚Ä¢ Enhanced annual leave plus 3 Wellbeing Days per year
‚Ä¢ Paid family leave (maternity, paternity, surrogacy & adoption)
‚Ä¢ Agile working (plus a Working from Abroad Policy!)
‚Ä¢ Support for your ongoing growth & development
‚Ä¢ Inclusive people policies (sickness, menopause, compassionate and fertility leave)
‚Ä¢ A chance to give back to your local community with 5 paid volunteering days

OUR BEHAVIOURS üèÜ
‚Ä¢ Grow others - We fundamentally believe that investing in growing others benefits everyone, whether it's helping them develop hard or soft skills. We want learning and growing to be part of our DNA to help makes us a better team, together.
‚Ä¢ Master it - We are obsessed with our area of expertise and enjoy developing our skills. We rarely take things at face value; we investigate, interrogate, and always look for ‚Äòthe why,‚Äô and wherever possible, we use data to find the best solution.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate - We are in it together, for the tough stuff and the celebrations too. To achieve the best results, we need expertise from all areas of the organisation, and we wholeheartedly welcome diverse thinking.
‚Ä¢ Adapt - We work fluidly, adapting to new information and the evolving environment while staying committed to our goals. Innovation and experimentation fuel our projects and we‚Äôre never afraid to pivot.
‚Ä¢ Deliver - Our focus is always on the end result; we value outcomes over activity. We collaborate to deliver work at speed without dropping any of our other behaviours.

We believe in talented and diverse teams that reflect the diversity of our customers and the communities in which we operate. Everyone brings different perspectives and experiences. We lay out the above requirements to guide applicants to the experiences that we believe will allow you to be successful in the role. If you don‚Äôt meet them all, please consider applying if you think you can still perform the role as described.

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer
jobs_results.description: Join us at Sky Portugal and be part of our exciting journey to lead the way in the streaming tech world! As a Senior iOS Developer, you'll play a key role in our innovative team dedicated to creating exceptional experiences for our global customers. From powering platforms like NBCUniversal‚Äôs Peacock in the United States to Sky‚Äôs NOW, and SkyShowtime across Europe, and now Showmax in over 40 countries in Africa, one thing‚Äôs for certain, your contributions will impact millions of viewers worldwide. What You'll Do: Develop excellent quality software using agile techniques Design clean, maintainable and reliable code Deliver highly scalable and highly reliable products Collaborate with other developers, sharing and receiving knowledge - yes you will learn a lot! Bring your best technology and software development practices into the team with passion and enthusiasm Contribute to the whole development cycle, analysis, implementation, testing and operation Operation excellence and support are part of the development teams‚Äô responsibility What You'll Bring: Development in native iOS languages - Swift iOS development experience Understanding of Design Patterns and Object-Oriented Design Knowledge of iOS App Architecture Experience working with Restful APIs Ability to work well in a team, self-driven and eager to learn Creative thinking, analytical skills, with attention to detail Fluent in English Benefits & Perks: Competitive Rewards: Above market salary, yearly bonus, and access to a share-save plan. Work-Life Flexibility: Embrace a hybrid working model and enjoy flexible holidays. Employee Benefits Plan: Access a wide range of benefits that are designed and tailored to your everyday needs. Health and Well-Being: Comprehensive health insurance for you and your family. Continuous Learning: Access learning and development opportunities and an additional budget that you can use for education and professional training. Tech Perks: Mobile phone with a data plan, and access to several partnerships and discounts. Entertainment Goodies: Enjoy the best of entertainment with a complimentary SkyShowtime subscription. Referral Rewards: Participate in our employee referral program and reap the rewards. Why wait? Apply now to build an amazing career and be part of a brilliant team. We can't wait to hear from you! Follow our LinkedIn page: https://www.linkedin.com/company/skyportugal/ A JOB YOU LOVE TO TALK ABOUT Vuoi fare il miglior lavoro della tua vita? Con 24 milioni di clienti in 6 paesi, lascia il tuo segno nel brand leader in Europa nel settore dei media e dell'intrattenimento. Job Alerts ‚Äì Le novit√† di Aprile Se ti iscrivi agli avvisi di lavoro, riceverai un'e-mail con le istruzioni per riconfermare il tuo interesse a ricevere le nostre comunicazioni. Conferma il tuo interesse a ricevere le nostre comunicazioni sulle nuove offerte di lavoro, potrebbe presentarsi l'occasione giusta.

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
eyenov is looking for a passionate iOS developer to integrate our team and to work in a multi-platform mobile video edit software.

You will be working alongside other engineers and developers working on different layers and different versions of the application. Therefore, a commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and the creation of quality products is essential.

Skills:
‚Ä¢ Proficient with Objective-C and/or Swift
Experience with iOS frameworks
Interest in building multimedia applications for video editing
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
Familiarity with continuous integration
Strong debugging skills
A knack for benchmarking and optimization
A born collaborator, you value communication and sharing knowledge. You also work well in a team setting and like to achieve common goals & objectives
Proficient in spoken and written English

Some of our perks and benefits include:
‚Ä¢ Private retirement plan
‚Ä¢ Health insurance
‚Ä¢ Productivity bonuses
‚Ä¢ Flexible work schedule
‚Ä¢ Possibility to work fully remote, hybrid or in our office located in the Greater Lisbon area.

About eyenov:
We are a company specialized in the fields of multimedia, computer graphics, augmented reality, virtual reality, computer vision, machine learning, mobile, desktop and server applications, as well as several other emerging state-of-the-art technologies. One of the strongest points of our team is the ability to adapt to new technological challenges, even if it requires large R&D background work or to come up with novel concepts, algorithms or paradigms.

If you‚Äôre looking for a new challenge, something different and to work with top notch senior software developers on highly addictive projects, get on board!

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
iOS Developer
iOS Engineer
jobs_results.description:
Pixelmatters is a digital product studio. We‚Äôre a team of strategists, designers and engineers creating top-quality digital products.

Our mission is to empower businesses to achieve their full potential by creating top-quality digital products while fostering great relationships along the way. We envision a world where great user experience is the norm, not the exception, inspiring businesses and people to be at their best.

We‚Äôre looking for you ‚Äî an adaptable, and meticulous problem-solver iOS Engineer who possesses a passion for mobile technologies with an exceptional ability to bring mobile applications to life. A team player who likes to work in a fast-paced environment and has no problem dealing with pressure. You can work closely with Clients, Managers, Designers and other Engineers. You have the ambition to work on innovative and inspiring projects.

You believe in your skills and your perspective about the technology world, so you are ready to share your talent with our team. On top of everything, you are someone with pride and passion for what you do.

Requirements

‚Ä¢ At least 3 years of experience as an iOS Engineer
‚Ä¢ Bachelor‚Äôs degree in engineering, computer science, or related field
‚Ä¢ Experience with Swift and Xcode toolset
‚Ä¢ Familiarity working with mobile design patterns
‚Ä¢ Ability to integrate web services (RESTful, JSON)
‚Ä¢ Understanding of the full mobile development lifecycle (UI implementation and data modeling)
‚Ä¢ Familiar with version control systems such as Git
‚Ä¢ Good understanding of English and Portuguese (written and spoken)

It would be awesome if you also have...

‚Ä¢ Portfolio of iOS apps in the App Store
‚Ä¢ Knowledge on other mobile platforms (native Android and hybrid solutions)
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of automated testing platforms and unit tests

Benefits

‚Ä¢ Quality-driven, inspiring, and collaborative work environment, where Good is not good enough.
‚Ä¢ Benefits package, including health insurance.
‚Ä¢ A beautiful office located at Porto‚Äôs downtown, while continuing to support our ‚ÄúRemote as default, Office as an option‚Äù policy.

Compensation

‚Ä¢ The salary range from this role is between ‚Ç¨27,039 to ‚Ç¨45,589 annual gross, which includes meal, vacation and Xmas allowances.

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
Senior iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
About komoot

Komoot is an app that lets you find, plan, and share adventures with its easy route planner. Driven by a love for nature and powered by the outdoor community‚Äôs recommendations, komoot helps you explore more of the great outdoors‚Äîwherever and however you want. And we're good at it. Google and Apple have listed us as one of their Apps of the Year numerous times. Today, with over 35 million users and 300,000 five-star reviews, we are well on our way to becoming the most popular app for finding, planning, and sharing adventures worldwide.

Join our 100% remote team and start your adventure with komoot.

About the role

You‚Äôll team up with six world class iOS engineers and take over full responsibility for our iOS app. Touching all parts of the iOS app, your work will make outdoor adventures easily accessible to our users. You‚Äôll develop diverse features for navigation, routing, social interaction and content visualisation that will make your work challenging and fun.

Ready for your next adventure?

What you will do
‚Ä¢ Develop innovative new features from the first idea and concept over to road map planning, implementation, testing, release and monitoring.
‚Ä¢ Work in one of our cross-functional squads of backend, web and mobile developers, designers, copywriters, QA, data scientists, and product experts.
‚Ä¢ Team up with six team members to build a state of the art iOS app with more than 5 million installations.
‚Ä¢ Release frequently with continuous builds, testing and direct team feedback.

Why you will love it
‚Ä¢ Your work will contribute to helping millions of people enjoy lovely outdoor experiences.
‚Ä¢ We‚Äôve been a remote-working company since 2017, meaning: We are remote by default, have frameworks and systems in place, and know how to do it well.
‚Ä¢ You can work from wherever you want, be it a beach, the mountains, your house, or anywhere else that lies in any time zone between UTC-1 and UTC+3.
‚Ä¢ We have your costs covered for your co-working space membership or your work-from-home office setup and the latest devices and equipment to do your best work.
‚Ä¢ You‚Äôll become an essential part of our diverse and international team with colleagues based in 20+ countries across Europe.
‚Ä¢ 38 paid days off (inclusive public holidays) ‚Äì you are free to take those days whenever it suits you, including a well-deserved winter holiday break.
‚Ä¢ We love seeing people grow. That's why each team member gets ‚Ç¨2,000 and 3 additional days to spend on professional development each year. Classes, conferences, books ‚Äì your choice!

Requirements

You‚Äôll be successful in this role if you
‚Ä¢ Are highly self-driven, responsible and keen to learn and improve.
‚Ä¢ Love to develop awesome products with a focus on great user experiences.
‚Ä¢ Have 4+ years of professional experience with developing high quality production iOS apps.
‚Ä¢ Have 3+ years of professional experience in Swift development.
‚Ä¢ Love to work fullstack on native iOS apps.
‚Ä¢ Have a deep and up to date knowledge of iOS design principles and patterns, the core iOS frameworks and technologies.
‚Ä¢ Write code that's readable, well documented and meaningfully tested.
‚Ä¢ Are a great team player and communicator in a diverse and international remote team.

Not sure if you meet all requirements above? Don't sweat it ‚Äì if you think you're the right person anyway, we'd love to hear from you!

Benefits

Curious about how we work?
‚Ä¢ Core Communication time between 10 am - 3 pm (Berlin Time). We know people have different lifestyles, which is why we have flexible working hours with core time for synchronous interaction. You can organize your workday in the way that best suits you, your family, and your needs.
‚Ä¢ We work on a project basis in cross functional teams to ensure that we collaborate on our goals, move forward smoothly with open lines of communication, and achieve results as a team.
‚Ä¢ Every Monday morning, we have a whole-company presentation where you hear about projects across the business, inspire each other, and share great work.
‚Ä¢ We connect in person at three whole-company gatherings each year in beautiful locations. You can check out this playlist to find out more about how we stay close while being remote.
‚Ä¢ We use tools like Trello, Slack, Miro, Zoom, and Google Workspace on a daily basis to stay connected, collaborate easily, and manage projects.

Dive a little deeper and learn‚Ä¶
‚Ä¢ More about how we work here: How We Work
‚Ä¢ More about our recruitment process, salary and FAQs here: FAQs

We support diversity and inclusivity and welcome all prospective applicants. We have an ongoing recruitment process (no deadlines) ‚Äì if this role is online, it means it‚Äôs still open!

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
WE DEVELOP PEOPLE WHO DEVELOP TECHNOLOGY

And we want to develop you!

At Growin people always come first.

Why? Because we believe happy, talented people are the ones who can change the world: one code line at a time.

We have several projects waiting for you all over Portugal - both hybrid and full remote - where you can grow professionally and take your career to the next level.

Are you a savvy

iOS Developer
seeking a new challenge in a dynamic team of

developers
? We want to know more about you!

Tell us about your:
‚Ä¢ experience in creating and optimizing web-based solutions using IOS
‚Ä¢ knowledge of Swift and Objective-C
‚Ä¢ ability to Integrate with external services through APIs
‚Ä¢ ability to automate processes, streamlining the development lifecycle and defined roadmap
‚Ä¢ ability to write simple, clean, high-quality code
‚Ä¢ experience in working with relational and non-relational databases
‚Ä¢ ability to communicate in English

We‚Äôve got your back

At Growin, we encourage our people to be the best versions of themselves. And we do it together, because we believe

Together We Grow Better.

What's in it for you?
‚Ä¢ a tailor-made career management plan
‚Ä¢ opportunity to learn and grow professionally
‚Ä¢ work-life balance
‚Ä¢ a phenomenal and supportive team

‚Ä¶ and so much more!

What are you waiting for to join us?
